caption.title: Temporal relationship between %TOC and δ 13C org in eight sediment multicores taken from across the Lake Superior basin.
caption.p: Increases in both %TOC and δ 13C org are indicative of increasing lake-wide primary production. *Note varying horizontal scales. %TOC is plotted as a wt./wt. ratio of dry sediment, and δ 13C org as per mil (‰) relative to the standard—Vienna PeeDee Belemnite (VPDB).
